comment._content: Parece ser un cuadrilla del ejercito independentista cubano en  una trocha

comment.author: 9132894@N07
comment._content: This place should be one of the posts who were part of "La Trocha de Jucaro a Morón" , which was located across the narrows part of the island, to stop the cubans troops from getting into the western part of the country
